document.full_text: federal prosecutors, citing national security concerns, urged a judge on thursday not to force them to turn over to the defense more materials in the case of a somali man charged with trying to blow up an oregon christmas tree-lighting ceremony.
document.title: oregon bomb case prosecutors seek to block material release
lines_and_colors: federal prosecutors, citing national security concerns, urged a judge on thursday not to force them to turn over to the defense more materials in the case of a somali man charged with trying to blow up an oregon christmas tree-lighting ceremony.
